titleStmt.title: A defence of the Roman Church VVherin is treated, vvhether the said Church of Rome hath fallen in faith, or no? Written in Latin by the R. F. Martinus Becanus of the Society of Iesus, Professour in Diuinity: and now translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Becanus, Martinus, 1563-1624.
Wright, William, 1563-1639.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer from STC.
Running title reads: VVhether the Church of Rome hath fallen, or no?.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
